name: Petal Vogue
description: A fast fashion e-commerce platform where each product has a unique page with specific coloring and sizing. Key features include a sorting system, search functionality, wishlist management, and a user-friendly cart system. Product details can be edited directly from the wishlist or cart. The platform also features a recommendation system that suggests products based on user preferences. It is fully responsive and maintains data between refreshes using local storage.

name: Weather App
description: Weather App containing a searchable zipcode for a location's weather displaying a 24 hour weather forecast and 3 day forecast from a free weather API.

name: Calculator
description: Simple Calculator able to clear, change sign, percent, and simple operation.

name: Etch A Sketch
description: A recreation of a Etch-A-Sketch on a web page able to change size of grid, draw, erase, and clear the grid.

name: Image slider
description: Simple image-slider mini project implementing a slider alongside a shift of each image following the cursor and a hover effect.
